Name: Mutagenic
About the game: You are a lonely hero, spawned into a brutal world occupied by countless hostile creatures. Mutagenic is a hardcore roguelite action game, where every choice matters. Key Features Unique Playstyles With multiple characters and skills to choose from, there is a playstyle for everyone. Build Diversity A diverse set of items, skills, and mutations all allow unique interactions and plenty of opportunity for build customization. Replayability Every time you spawn a new mutated hero, your path forward will be different. Learn, adapt, and conquer the foes that await you. Great treasure awaits only the strongest of heros. Powerful Loot Find modifications to skills and items which can turn you from a hero into a god.
